hero.title: Modern And Well Connected Houses for Rent in Sector 84 Gurugram
description: Sector 84 Gurugram is a rapidly developing residential area known for its planned infrastructure, peaceful surroundings, and excellent connectivity. Tenants searching for a house for rent in Sector 84 Gurugram are drawn to this locality because it offers a modern lifestyle while staying close to major routes like Dwarka Expressway, NH-48, and Pataudi Road. The sector is part of New Gurugram, making it a preferred choice for professionals working in corporate hubs and industrial zones nearby.

Independent houses in Sector 84 provide spacious layouts, good ventilation, and a comfortable living experience. The area is surrounded by reputed schools, healthcare centers, shopping complexes, and daily convenience stores, ensuring all essential needs are easily accessible. Choosing a house for rent in Sector 84 Gurugram is ideal for families and individuals looking for long-term rental stability, safety, and a balanced urban lifestyle.

faqSection.description: Common tenant questions related to house for rent in Sector 84 Gurugram.

faqs.question: Is Sector 84 Gurugram a good area to rent a house?
faqs.answer: Yes, Sector 84 is a well-planned and developing area with excellent connectivity and modern infrastructure, making it ideal for renting.

faqs.question: What types of houses are available for rent in Sector 84?
faqs.answer: Independent houses ranging from 4 Marla to 14 Marla are commonly available for rent in Sector 84.

faqs.question: Is Sector 84 suitable for family living?
faqs.answer: Yes, the area has schools, hospitals, parks, and daily convenience stores nearby, making it family-friendly.

faqs.question: Are furnished houses available in Sector 84?
faqs.answer: Yes, furnished, semi-furnished, and unfurnished houses are available depending on the property.

faqs.question: What is the average rent in Sector 84 Gurugram?
faqs.answer: Rental prices vary based on plot size, amenities, and exact location within the sector.

faqs.question: How is connectivity from Sector 84?
faqs.answer: Sector 84 has excellent connectivity via Dwarka Expressway, NH-48, and major city roads.

faqs.question: Are bachelors allowed to rent houses in Sector 84?
faqs.answer: Some landlords allow bachelors, while others prefer families, depending on property rules.

faqs.question: Is Sector 84 safe for tenants?
faqs.answer: Yes, Sector 84 is a secure and well-populated residential area with planned infrastructure.
